title: Anyone else in OCE getting serious lag?
body:
I don't usually get lag in league but today huge spikes all day. I'm the only one on this connection and i'm not downloading so I thought I would ask if anyone else is experiencing it?

On a lighter note, I have come back after two months of not playing and people generally seem to be nicer in games! I mean there are still a few assholes blaming everyone else for how shitty they are playing... but overall it's like a massive shift in attitude.

Or maybe I've just had a good couple of days. Hope it continues :-D

replies.body: I want to say glad it's not just me. But that would be mean. Stupid lag.

Thank God! I thought it was only me, because my brother finally got a wifi extender for his computer, but now seeing that all of you guys are getting serious lag, I can see it's not just me. However this has been happening to me for about a week now

I heard a rumor that due to the arrival of netflix in Australia and lot more streaming occurring because of it the bandwidth of internet companies is suffering thus causing unstable ping. I don't know how true this is but from what I have deduced 5pm-10pm seem to be the worst for unstable ping. Hope this helps somewhat. :)
Same here. My norm ping is around 80-100 but today it keeps spiking and jumps from 80 to 1100 which is really stupid

I'm having the same issue ever since the update that added Zed back in the game (today). I've been having constant ping spikes regardless of the fact that my internet is perfect & I normally have 24 ping & no issues whatsoever.
The hamster in your wood pc might have stopped running?
It's alienware and it's less than a year old. Also my computer being shit wouldn't effect my latency. Maybe my framerate if it was super old.
